properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Statement issued February 18 at 6:20AM EST until February 18 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wind becomes west and increases to gusts near 35 mph
during afternoon. The wind across partially ice covered water
could result in a combination of high waves and thin ice piling
into the shoreline.

* WHERE...Huron county shoreline and St. Clair county shoreline of
Lake St Clair.

* WHEN... late morning through this evening.

* IMPACTS... Briefly higher water level due to onshore wind and
waves. Thin ice could also pile into the shoreline.
properties.instruction:
Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to
protect property.

NWSheadline: BRIEF ENHANCEMENT OF SHORELINE FLOODING POSSIBLE TODAY
